doc:
Gérard Jugnot https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G%C3%A9rard_Jugnot 0 Gérard Jugnot (born 4 May 1951) is a French actor, film director, screenwriter and film producer. Jugnot was one of the founders of the comedy troupe Le Splendid in the 1970s, along with, among others, his high-school friends Christian Clavier, Thierry Lhermitte, and Michel Blanc. Then Josiane Balasko and Marie-Anne Chazel joined them. The group adapted a number of its stage hits for the cinema and was extremely successful in films such as Les Bronzés (1978), Les Bronzés font du ski (1979) and Le Père Noël est une ordure (1982). Jugnot gained international fame for his lead role in Les Choristes in which he played Clément Mathieu. The last movie he directed was C'est beau la vie quand on y pense (2017). Jugnot is the father of comedian Arthur Jugnot, born in 1980 to Jugnot and wardrobe designer Cécile Magnan. He was made Chevalier (Knight) of the Légion d'honneur in 2004. Gérard_Jugnot ( born 4_May_1951 ) is a_French_actor , film_director , screenwriter_and_film_producer . Jugnot was one of the_founders of the_comedy_troupe_Le_Splendid in the_1970s , along with , among others , his_high-school_friends Christian_Clavier , Thierry_Lhermitte , and Michel_Blanc . Then Josiane_Balasko and Marie-Anne_Chazel joined them . The_group adapted a_number of its_stage hits for the_cinema and was extremely_successful in films such_as Les_Bronzés_(_1978_) , Les_Bronzés_font_du_ski ( 1979 ) and Le_Père_Noël_est_une_ordure ( 1982_) . Jugnot gained international_fame for his_lead_role in Les_Choristes in which he played Clément_Mathieu . The_last_movie he directed was C'est_beau_la vie_quand on y_pense ( 2017_) . Jugnot is the_father of comedian_Arthur_Jugnot , born in 1980 to Jugnot_and_wardrobe_designer_Cécile_Magnan . He was_made Chevalier_(_Knight_) of the_Légion_d'honneur in 2004 .
